floating_card.title: Beauty
floating_card.body: Taking care of the face is a form of self-love. Beauty begins when you become yourself, that's what you have to remember at all times. because of your beautiful face, make life more beautiful.

chartproduct.title: Successfully Added:
chartproduct.isi: Beauty is like success, positive thinking, then beauty will radiate, unity and simplicity are two sources of true beauty. that's a dream about you.
